statements: DELETE FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_name = 'City Park';
DELETE FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM urban_development WHERE project_name = 'New City Project';
DELETE FROM urban_development WHERE id = 100 AND end_date < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM land_use_types WHERE land_use_type = 'Residential' AND id > 10
DELETE FROM urban_development WHERE project_name = 'City Square Project';
DELETE FROM land_use WHERE land_type = 'Residential' AND area_name = 'Downtown';
DELETE FROM development_history WHERE project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM urban_projects WHERE project_name = 'ABC Project');
